titles.title: God has chosen us from all peoples

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
God has chosen us from all peoples,
He gave us his heart.
God has chosen us from all tribes and languages,
But gave us the name of one!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
When we are together - we are strong!
When we are together - the Lord among us!
When we are together - flows the love of God
Pour down to us.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
We are the church, we are the body of Christ,
We are redeemed by the blood of His!
The gates of hell will not prevail against us,
Because we are invincible!
